entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 10:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WNW 41 km/h gust 68 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
